original_title: Flesh Evil: Il male nella carne
overview: A horror atmosphere inspired by the parable " Shadow " by Edgar Allan Poe . The world is contaminated by " Evil" which manifests as the black shadow of a hooded figure and forcing the population of a small village to make sudden and brutal crimes . Three friends devoted to occultism can only partly counteract the evil . However a solution of the problem can be possible and help could come from the past ...
title: Flesh Evil: Il male nella carne
